update.description:
When the comms model is working in simple mode**™**, all robots are considered neighbors and all messages will be delivered to their destinations.

The simple comms model can be enabled via the ROS parameter server \(_/subt/comms/simple\_mode_\).

For testing:

1\. Edit `subt_gazebo/worlds/tunnel_practice_1.world` and reduce the maximum comms distance to 1 meter:

    <!-- The SubT comms broker plugin -->
        <plugin name="comms_broker_plugin" filename="libCommsBrokerPlugin.so">
          <comms_model>
            <neighbor_distance_min>0.0</neighbor_distance_min>
            <neighbor_distance_max>1.0</neighbor_distance_max>
            <comms_distance_min>0.0</comms_distance_min>
            <comms_distance_max>1.0</comms_distance_max>
            <comms_drop_probability_min>0.0</comms_drop_probability_min>
            <comms_drop_probability_max>0.0</comms_drop_probability_max>
            <comms_outage_probability>0.0</comms_outage_probability>
            <comms_outage_duration_min>0.0</comms_outage_duration_min>
            <comms_outage_duration_max>10.0</comms_outage_duration_max>
          </comms_model>
        </plugin>

2\. Compile and install as usual:

    catkin_make install

3\. Launch the simulation:

    roslaunch subt_gazebo quickstart.launch

4\. Press the left arrows of the joystick and verity that the LEDs aren’t flashing \(only the LED of the sender robot should flash\).

5\. Enable the simple mode:

    rosparam set /subt/comms/simple_mode true

6\. Repeat the step \(4\) and you should observe the LED’s flashing indicating that the destination robot is receiving messages.

‌

I’ll update the documentation when this PR is merged.
update.title: Simple mode comms

update.title: Simple mode comms

content.raw: How about changing this to debug, and use ignmsg \(so that we don’t have to change this when we move away from gazebo9\)?
content.html: How about changing this to debug, and use ignmsg (so that we don’t have to change this when we move away from gazebo9)?
